name: Stickochet
description:
a neat little game where youre just a ball having a blast

press "p" to skip a level if youre in a pinch

press "r " to retry a level

hold down right click to steady aim

end screen music by autonixia @ https://autonixia.bandcamp.com

there can be very rare audio desync issues on webgl so if youre experiencing these i reccomend you use the dowloadable exports :)
